The KPML system offers a robust , mature platform for large - scale grammar engineering that is particularly oriented to multilingual grammar development and generation .It is particularly targetted at providing resources for realistic but broad - coverage generation applications , where both flexibility of expression and speed of generation are at issue - for example in online webpage generation or spoken dialogue .

The KPML system offers a robust , mature platform for large - scale grammar engineering that is particularly oriented to multilingual grammar development and generation .It is particularly targetted at providing resources for realistic but broad - coverage generation applications , where both flexibility of expression and speed of generation are at issue - for example in online webpage generation or spoken dialogue .

The symbolic generator includes the Sensus Ontology dictionary ( which is based on WordNet ) .The forest ranker includes a 250-million word ngram language model ( unigram , bigram , and trigram ) trained on WSJ newspaper text .
